Class Shipment

java.lang.Object
Shipment
public class Shipment extends Object
Models a shipment in the simulation.

04/29/2024
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • Shipment

      public Shipment(int id, Warehouse origin, Warehouse destination, int size)
      Creates a new shipment with the given id, origin, destination, and size.
      Parameters:
      id - the shipment id
      origin - the origin warehouse of the shipment
      destination - the destination warehouse of the shipment
      size - how large (1-3 units) the shipment is
